attributes.action: GIVE US BACK OUR COUNTRY AND OUR FREEDOM OF SPEECH AND THOUGHT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: YOU HAVE GIVEN OUR PROUD NATION TO EUROPE,YOU CONSTANTLY UNDERMINE YOUR OWN FAITH BY SUCKING UP TO ISLAM,YOU HAVE TAKEN AWAY OUR RIGHT TO FREE SPEECH ,AND ALSO YOUR POLICIES ON MULTICULTURISM HAVE ALIENATED VAST AMOUNTS OF NORMAL PEOPLE

rejection.details: Please write in upper and lower case for ease of reading for users.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
